long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the extension to integrate online proctoring with your LMS Platform

This extension will enable online proctoring capabilities for quizzes and assessments conducted through your LMS platform. The ExamOnline proctoring uses advanced Artificial Intelligence capabilities to ensure the security and sanctity of the exams even when the exams are conducted from your LMS such as Moodle.

The extension will be used to monitor the students only during the exams for which ExamOnline proctoring is enabled.
Your personal information will remain safe and secure and will not be shared by any third party
EOProctor will collect only those personal information which is required for safe conduct of exam and no other information shall be collected.

It is important to note that EOProctor will monitor only those activities which are required for ensuring fairness of the exam and only for the duration of the exam. We take your privacy concerns very seriously. You may view our privacy policy on our website www.examonline.in for more details on data security and privacy.
